snippet.title: 99 NiGHTS in the LAVA VOLCANO!!  New Event Party with Niko and Friends! Ram Update & Mega Occultist
snippet.description:
we got the ADMiN AXE in 99 NiGHTS!!

JOIN THE FAM - https://www.youtube.com/@GforGaming

HEY EVERYBODY!! Today we are bringing you a CRAZY episode of G for Gaming with Niko, Dad and friends! We heard rumors that there was going to be an awesome new update on 99 Nights in the Forest on Roblox! New weapons, new enemies, new items and more! We were all so excited to try it out, we hopped on 99 Nights before the update even came out, just to be ready for it! We got surprised with an update party where the admin and developers of the game put us in a special version of the game where we got to try out all of the new stuff early! As soon as we joined in, we were getting crazy stuff right off the bat! We instantly had enough wood to completely finish our campfire before the first night even started because the admin dropped TONS of wood for us so we didn't even need to worry about it! After that we explored a little bit but then they were dropping us free new weapons to test out! We got laser cannons, tactical shotguns and even the new Infernal Crossbow that was part of the new Volcano Biome from the new update! We were especially excited to see the new big enemy type... THE GOAT! The goat has horns on his head and will charge up and rush at you when you are least expecting it! But, Niko figured out how to avoid him super fast! Then, at the end of the party... the update was finally out! BUT... we will show you what that's all about in the NEXT 99 Nights video here on G for Gaming!!

THANKS FOR WATCHING!! BYE! PSSSSSSHHHHHHHHHH

enjoy some A for Adley videos: https://www.youtube.com/c/AforAdleyLe...
have a blast with our A for Adley Shorts: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMHpfyAqrjrhn-mRS2bUL0g
share a best day ever with our family: https://www.youtube.com/user/Shonduras
fun best day ever shorts: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgVE...

watch the latest A for Adley video: [ ASK ADLEY ] Mailbox Delivery & Decorating! Gummy Bear Experiment! Questions with Niko & Navey [2]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HmL9BjLcESQ


this is our channel G for Gaming!! this is a place that i can share all of my favorite gaming moments!!
